alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; Livingston (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 11:40AM CDT until April 15 at 12:30PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Livingston Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Eastern East Baton Rouge Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 1230 PM CDT. * At 1140 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gardere, or near Oak Hills Place, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Baker, Denham Springs, Port Allen, Oak Hills Place, Walker, Livingston, French Settlement, Port Vincent, Westminster, Old Jefferson, Merrydale, Inniswold, Watson, Village St. George, Shenandoah, Gardere, Brownfields, Greenwell Spring and Baton Rouge Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 155 and 168. Interstate 12 between mile markers 1 and 26. Interstate 110 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 8. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
